schema_version.description: Protocol version, fixed as '1.0' in v1.

event_type.description: Semantic category (e.g. session.start, user.message, agent.reply, session.end).

session_id.description: Session identifier for a lifecycle instance.

trace_id.description: Correlation identifier for a causal chain.

ts.description: UTC timestamp in RFC3339/ISO8601 with milliseconds and trailing Z.

payload_hash.description: SHA-256 hex digest of canonicalized payload.

prev_envelope_hash.description: Optional pointer to previous event's envelope_hash in the same session (if envelope_hash is implemented).

envelope_hash.description: Optional deterministic hash of the envelope projection for tamper-evidence (see protocol canonicalization contract).
